title: Orthodox Church of Ukraine to allow Christmas on December 25 as rift with Moscow deepens
description: A branch of Ukraine's Orthodox church has announced that it will allow its churches to celebrate Christmas on December 25, rather than January 7, as is traditional in Orthodox congregations.

title: What early exit? China doubles down on zero-Covid pledge despite public frustration
description: China has reiterated its unswerving commitment to its longstanding zero-Covid policy, despite mounting public frustration the stringent measures are costing the very lives they're intended to protect.

title: Hunger strike of jailed Egyptian-British activist may dominate the COP27 summit, Amnesty chief warns
description: The deteriorating health of jailed Egyptian-British activist, Alaa Abd El-Fattah will dominate the upcoming COP27 summit if Egyptian authorities fail to intervene, Amnesty International has warned.
